articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Spanish football chief admits racism ‘problem’ after Vinícius Júnior abuse - The Guardian
articles.description: Comments follow racial abuse of Real Madrid player during match against Valencia
articles.content:
The head of Spains national football federation has said the country has a problem with racism following the abuse hurled at Real Madrids Vinícius Júnior during Sundays match against Valencia.
